name: Jib Life Early Launch
blurb: A skiing/snowboarding game built around realistic physics and the idea of "if you can imagine it, you can hit it"...

rewards.reward: Access to the Camp of Champions Proving Grounds map + our most sincere thanks.
Previous pledge reward + all game updates during development, new maps, new gear, etc...

GREEN CIRCLE SUPPORTER - Access to game and all updates + an all green Outdoor Technology Yowie in game item + game achievement. In addition we will allow you access to the beta forums + your name in the credits.

BLUE SQUARE SUPPORTER - Access to game and all updates + the following unique in game items signifying your supporter status: Jib Life Logo Tall T, Limited Edition Skis/Snowboard, Yowie, and Limited Edition Poles.
Newschoolers.com - All prior reward tiers + an exclusive newschoolers.com gear set up. With only 250 of these available EVER they will become a coveted collectors item in the game world.

CHAMPION SUPPORTER - Access to game and all updates + an exclusive in game Camp of Champions suit with skis or board. What better way to show your support for Jib Life than to support the camp that helped us get the game this far. Truly the most fun place in the world!

BLACK DIAMOND SUPPORTER - Access to game and all updates + the following unique in game items/abilities: Unique session spot marker, all black gear set up for your character, fully murdered out. This will be a completely unique black suit and will only be able to be acquired through this campaign.

ENTRY LEVEL DESIGNER - Access to game and all updates + a Jib Life swag pack (limited ed tall T, yowie, and sticker pack) + access to the feature designer portion of our website. Here you will be able to see what features we are working on, suggest designs, placement, etc.

DESIGNER - Access to game and all updates + access to our map development forums. You will be able to see all maps under development, as well as submit ideas/suggestions for changes, etc. We will also throw in a limited edition Jib Life Baller Cap + a limited edition Jib Life print and poster signed by the lead designer, and a digital copy of our entire developer diaries/documentary with exclusive commentary and timeline chronicling the ENTIRE history of Jib Life when done.

Get a hand painted Jib Life canvas by our logo artist Jack Byers. Measuring 6 feet by 3.5 feet these will each be one of a kind items. We will also throw in a set of signed limited edition wall posters numbered 1 - 10.
Custom Character Look -  Create a completely custom look for your character, designed by you and implemented by our design staff + a framed piece of concept art signed by the entire design team.

5 lucky supporters will have the chance to have their likeness immortalized into the game world. We will create a character to add into the games achievement system based off your likeness. We will also send you a framed and autographed concept sheet of your character.

Work with our art lead and lead designer to help create a unique feature for the game world. It can be anything, you are not limited to just one rail/jump/what have you. The feature will be up to you to name and we will include a framed and autographed version of the concept art for it, as well as feature a quick video around it to be posted on our facebook page and website. NDA required.

1 lucky player/sponsor will work directly with our map designers to help create a unique map for the game. The map will be released for free to the public and have a full promotional/development video to document the entire process released along side it. On top of this, you will get all the concept art framed and signed by our entire design team as well as a personal thank you from our lead developers. NDA Required.
